QuestData.Title: First Lieutenant Connor
QuestData.Description: The first time I heard about Lt. Connor, I was just a young recruit in the Stormwind stockades. None of us could believe he ended up here on Tol Barad. Sadly, he still roams these wretched islands, wreaking havoc on our troops morale.$b$bI need you to put an end to his misery... and ours.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: No one wanted to end up here, but we don't always get what we want.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and kill First Lieutenant Connor at Forgotten Hill. You will find Forgotten Hill on the far west side of the island.
